OEE Reporting Tools.

= Introduction =

The purpose of this project is to have a GUI-driven program to process raw *bde* data. A report is generated for the processed data. The report is further used by other programs for additional analysis, which is out of the scope of this project. 

The functionalities of the program should include following items:
 * Read a ASCII text based *.bde file.
 * Reconcile the content of the file and store as Database format.
 * validate the data using a set of validation rules.
 * Generate helpful messages for any erroneous/invalid data for user correct the data in the bde file.
 * Generate a report using a set of sum-up rules based on the validated data.
 * The program must have a GUI for easy access.
